name: True or False 2
description:
Full-fledged sequel to the popular quiz game True or False!
Take a new quiz to test your knowledge and intuition - and learn more interesting facts along the way!

Your goal is simple: decide whether the statements are true or false. Some of them may seem pretty crazy, but they are true; while other "facts" are actually false.

What did the emus do to deserve armed combat? You will soon know the answer!Key Features
  • All-new surprising and entertaining facts,
  • Steam Trading Cards & Achivements,
  • Calm and relaxing OST.
